programme.title: 60 Days In - New Sheriff in Town (Season 5, Episode 1)
programme.desc: Newly elected sheriff Mark Lamb sends six volunteers into the Pinal County Detention Center on a mission to uncover valuable Intel about the gangs, drugs, and operational issues that plague his facility.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Straight Cholo (Season 5, Episode 2)
programme.desc: With three participants in the jail and two more on their way in, Sheriff Lamb's mission-based program is off to the races.

programme.title: 60 Days In - It's About to Get Ugly (Season 5, Episode 3)
programme.desc: With all seven participants embedded in the facility, some struggle to maintain their distance from one another. Meanwhile, one participant threatens to bring the whole program to an abrupt end.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Y'All Thought I Was Nice (Season 5, Episode 4)
programme.desc: The participants begin to focus on their missions. Some find early success while others are met with immediate interference and Sheriff Lamb is forced to make a tough decision.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Liars and Thieves (Season 5, Episode 5)
programme.desc: The participants are tested by thieves and the racial politics of jail, forcing them to become either targets and victims - or threats and aggressors.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Smells Like a Rat (Season 5, Episode 6)
programme.desc: David has climbed the ranks in the pod and struggles to remember what side he is on. Abner continues running the Chicanos as the enforcer and is put to the test when one of his own commits an offense.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Retaliation (Season 1, Episode 1)
programme.desc: In the city of New Orleans, police officers, firefighters, and emergency medical technicians working the overnight shift answer as many as a thousand emergency calls every night.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Officer Down (Season 1, Episode 3)
programme.desc: After a quiet beginning of the evening, multiple calls virtually explode across the radio at once--and the most alarming code heard is for "Officer Shot." The overwhelming response to that call leaves EMT's Titus and Dan to endure an agonizing wait.

programme.title: Nightwatch - The Darkest Shift on the Scariest Night (Season 1, Episode 4)
programme.desc: Halloween provides a fitting backdrop to a night on the job that includes some chilling calls. Captain Kevin leads the firefighters battling a blaze that's engulfed a house, and hopefully nothing more. Police officers Victor and Cedric hunt through.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Full Moon Rising (Season 1, Episode 6)
programme.desc: It's a full moon in New Orleans, and sure enough, all night long, the calls for the EMT's seem to get crazier and crazier: the victim of a machete hacking, the man whose finger is bitten off by a dog.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Cursed (Season 1, Episode 6)
programme.desc: The rich culture of Southern Louisiana is steeped with Cajun folklore and superstition. Weeks earlier, Deputy Tom Arnold was cursed by a suspect, and this comes to haunt the former California native.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Bone in my Swamp (Season 1, Episode 7)
programme.desc: The Terrebonne Parish Sheriff's Office has to be ready for anything. In this episode, Deputy Storm Fitch heads to the docks to meet with a shrimper who believes he's caught a human bone in his shrimp net.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Poached (Season 1, Episode 8)
programme.desc: In Terrebonne Parish, the local Cajuns are extremely territorial and very protective of their property. In this episode, New Orleans transplant Corporal Carey "CJ" Johnson is dispatched deep into the bayou.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Gator Man's Law (Season 1, Episode 10)
programme.desc: Terrebonne Parish nuisance alligator hunter Jacob Lirette has only a few precious tools he needs to catch and transport alligators - his fishing pole, his guns, and his truck.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Retaliation (Season 1, Episode 1)
programme.desc: In the city of New Orleans, police officers, firefighters, and emergency medical technicians working the overnight shift answer as many as a thousand emergency calls every night.
